channel.title: Client Updater
channel.description: I have project insanity client. There is one thing i really want to get. I want to be able to give someoen my client for download but then when i update it will also update everyone elce's client with what i added. Thankyou moparscape i have asked alot of questions and i thank everyone who has helped a newb coder like me :)

item.title: Client Updater
item.dc:creator: @zygis227 zygis227
item.description:
@zygis227 wrote:

well make a webclient base on your client and just repack the jar and re upload it will be updated.

this will update only code. not cache

Read full topic
